channel.title: A few question please help!
channel.description:
#1 - Well the server i downloaded has sounds. when you attack monster they sound. How can i remove these horrible sounds? #2 - I have added dragon claws to emote and anims to my client, but how do i add the right gfx, and anims to server side.
I also have msn - Graff_is_art@hotmail.cm
If you would want to teamview please post & ill give id and pass.
Thanks so much, samuel.
